mapper.select: select cname from room r inner join roomCategory rc on r.num = rc.roomNum inner join category c on rc.categoryNum = c.num where r.num = #{num}
select fname, imageUrl from room r inner join roomFacility rf on r.num = rf.roomNum inner join facility f on rf.facilityNum = f.num where r.num = #{num}

SELECT r.num, name, r.address, weekAmPrice, headcount, writeday, companyName, hideStatus, approvalStatus, readCount, thumbnailImage FROM room r inner join host h on r.hostNum = h.num where hideStatus = 1 and approvalStatus = 1 order by num desc limit 9
mapper.update: update room set approvalStatus = 1, hideStatus = 1 where num = #{roomNum}
update room set approvalStatus = 0, hideStatus = 0 where num = #{roomNum}
mapper.select: select * from room r inner join host h on h.num = r.hostNum order by r.readcount desc limit 5
select * from room r inner join host h on r.hostNum = h.num where approvalStatus = 0 order by r.num desc
select * from room where num not in (select roomNum from roomTheme where themeNum=#{themeNum})
